alert.note: Alert for North Itasca; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Itasca County through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Squaw Lake, or 37 miles east of Bemidji, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oslund around 620 PM CDT. Inger around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sand Lake, Jessie Lake, Spring Lake, Whitefish Lake, Max, North Star Lake, Bowstring Lake, Talmoon and Bowstring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
